name: Separate Quest
description:
SEPARATE QUEST

Welcome to Separate Quest, a small puzzle adventure game where each of your information, inventory and map are on separate windows.

The current version contain only one level and is meant to show a proof of concept for the MiniJam 121.

Further update post jam information will be post here.

COMMAND Keyboard / Controller
Move: WASD , ZQSD / LEFT STICK
Action: ENTER / BUTTON A
Reset: ESCAPE / BUTTON B
Change Class: i , o / LEFT, RIGHT BUMPER 

WHOLE GAMEPLAY
